title: How to Remix a Snapchat: Snaps, Stories, and More

steps.title: Open the Snapchat app.
steps.content: Open the Snapchat app. This looks like a ghost icon with a yellow background. [1] X Research source Snapchat is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . If you're not already logged in, tap Sign in to do so now or create a Snapchat account . By default, the camera will be open.

steps.title: Navigate to the Snap you want to remix.
steps.content: Navigate to the Snap you want to remix. You can tap the Stories tab to remix your or a friend's story, tap the Chat tab to select media from a conversation, or tap the Memories icon to select a saved Snap. You can now remix photos and videos in Snapchat.

steps.title: Tap the Snap.
steps.content: Tap the Snap. This must be a Snap created by a friend or by yourself. The Snap will open in full view.

steps.title: Tap and hold the Snap.
steps.content: Tap and hold the Snap. A pop-up menu will open from the bottom.

steps.title: Tap Remix Snap.
steps.content: Tap Remix Snap . This is towards the bottom of the menu. The Remix menu will open. If you don't see this option, see the next section for fixes.

steps.title: Select your remix type.
steps.content: Select your remix type. You can choose different layouts for your remix. Smiley face : This will overlay your eyes and mouth over your Snap. Rectangle with a horizontal line : The Snap will be on the top half, and your camera will be on the bottom half. Rectangle with a vertical line : The Snap will be on the right half and your camera will be on the left half. Rectangle with a circle : This will display the Snap in a separate window on top of your camera, similar to the FaceTime layout. Person : The Snap will act as a green screen with you in the foreground.

steps.title: Press and hold the record button.
steps.content: Press and hold the record button. With the remix layout active, you can begin recording your reaction to the Snap. Release the button when you're finished recording. You'll be taken to the editing page.

steps.title: Edit your Snap.
steps.content: Edit your Snap. You can add stickers, filters, text, and more.

steps.title: Send or save your Snap.
steps.content: Send or save your Snap. To save your Snap, tap the download icon (arrow pointing down above a line). To send your Snap, tap Send To to select a friend or group chat. To upload the remixed Snap to your Story, tap the Stories button.

steps.title: What does "remix Snap" mean on Snapchat?
steps.content: What does "remix Snap" mean on Snapchat? Remix works similarly to Duets on TikTok, where you can have an original photo or video merged with a new one.

steps.title: Why can't I remix Snaps on Snapchat?
steps.content: Why can't I remix Snaps on Snapchat? If you can't remix a certain Snap, you may not have permission to do so. You can only remix your or a friend's Snaps. You may also be able to remix a Snap on Spotlight.

steps.title: Why can't I remix a snap on Snapchat?
steps.content: Why can't I remix a snap on Snapchat? If you don't see the option to remix a Snap, you may be running an older version of Snapchat. Make sure the app is updated to the latest version by going to the App Store or Google Play Store. If you still can't see it, restart your device. You can also check if your account has been locked, disabled, or deactivated by submitting a request to Snapchat.

steps.title: How do I use a sticker on Snapchat?
steps.content: How do I use a sticker on Snapchat? If you want to add a sticker to your Snap, just tap the sticker icon on the right side of the editing page. Select the kind of sticker you want to use. Tap and drag it to the desired location. You can even pin the sticker to a moving subject on a video Snap. Tap and hold the sticker, and then drag it to where you want it pinned. Tap Pin to Snap . If you want to create your own sticker, tap the scissors icon on the right side of the editing page. Use your finger to outline the object. The new sticker will be added to your sticker drawer.

steps.title: Can a person see when you remix their Snap?
steps.content: Can a person see when you remix their Snap? Snapchat does not notify users when you remix a Snap like they do when you take a screenshot . If you take a screenshot of their Snap while making your remix, the person will be notified.
